== Fork? ==
Does it make sense to have two separate articles about the same ship? [[User:John K|john k]] ([[User talk:John K|talk]]) 20:58, 20 October 2011 (UTC) :I believe [[Wikipedia:Naming conventions (ships)|this]] states something about how if a ship had notable service in both navies, two articles is suggested. [[User:Buggie111|Buggie111]] ([[User talk:Buggie111|talk]]) 23:13, 20 October 2011 (UTC) ::It says two articles may be appropriate. I would suggest that two articles, in general, is not terribly appropriate, but it's true that that solves some naming issues. [[User:John K|john k]] ([[User talk:John K|talk]]) 01:16, 21 October 2011 (UTC)
==Assessment comment== {{Substituted comment|length=104|lastedit=20120301123111|comment=Needs cleanig, referencing and expansion.--[[User:Yannismarou|Yannismarou]] 09:37, 13 October 2006 (UTC)}} Substituted at 16:42, 29 April 2016 (UTC)
